import React, { useContext, useState } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import { Context } from '../../context/Context' import './write.css' export default function Write() { const [title, setTitle] = useState('') const [desc, setDesc] = useState('') const [file, setFile] = useState(null) const { user } = useContext(Context) const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() const newPost = { title, desc, } axios.post('/posts') } return (
) }
